created_at.description: The time the identity was created

deliverable_state.description: Email identity type only. Indicates if Zendesk sends notifications to the email address.

primary.description: If the identity is the primary identity. *Writable only when creating, not when updating. Use the Make Identity Primary endpoint instead

type.description: The type of this identity. Allowed values are 'email', 'twitter', 'facebook', 'google', 'phone_number', 'agent_forwarding', 'any_channel', 'foreign', or 'sdk'.

undeliverable_count.description: The number of times a soft-bounce response was received at that address

updated_at.description: The time the identity was updated

url.description: The API url of this identity

value.description: The identifier for this identity, such as an email address

verified.description: If the identity has been verified
